responses: Hello, Thanks for visiting my shop
Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help you?
Bye! Hope you come back soon.

patterns: Can I return and exchange goods 1 for 1?
In case the delivery is far away, what is the warranty period?
responses: Hardware warranty is 12 months from the date of product delivery
1 for 1 exchange within 15 days of first use from the date of product delivery
Battery and charger warranty is 3 months from the date of product handover
In case of sending goods far away, the warranty will be calculated from the date the customer receives the product from the carrier
